This is a Next.js project for a Valentine’s Day themed Tic Tac Toe game. The game should have:
- A player selection screen with images for Srikar and Rhea.
- Use their images as markers on the board.
- Show a funny image of the other person when someone wins.
- Festive, cute Valentine’s Day design.
- Ready for Vercel deployment.
